events.text: could i see graphicsgale gareth's note?

Sure!
"Each protien shake includes exactly three of five [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color] and no two shakes are exactly alike"
"The five [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color] used are: [color=#FF0000]Protein Powder[/color], [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color], [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color], [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color], and [color=#FF0000]Pistachios[/color]"
"Additionally, each [color=#FF0000]ingredient[/color] has a unique, exclusive [color=#0000FF]quality[/color]: [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color], [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color], [color=#0000FF]Absorbant[/color], [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color], and [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color]"
"Your goal is to find which [color=#00FF00]blender[/color] holds [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] and what [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color] were used"
"A protein shake with both the [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] and [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color] ingredient will explode unless the [color=#0000FF]Absorbant[/color] is also used"
"A protein shake with the [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color] ingredient will taste delicious"
"A protein shake with the [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color] ingredient will be poisonous"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]2[/color] and [color=#00FF00]9[/color] have exploded"
"Shake [color=#00FF00]7[/color] has the [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color] ingredient"
"The [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color] is either the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] or the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color]"
"Shake [color=#00FF00]6[/color] does not contain the [color=#0000FF]Absorbant[/color]"
"Shake [color=#00FF00]9[/color] contains [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color]"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]8[/color] and [color=#00FF00]10[/color] [color=#0000FF]taste[/color] delicious"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]4[/color], [color=#00FF00]6[/color], and [color=#00FF00]10[/color] contain [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color]"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]2[/color] and [color=#00FF00]6[/color] share exactly two [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color]"
"[color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] are not [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color]"
"[color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] has pH OF 7 (neither [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] nor [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color])"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]6[/color] and [color=#00FF00]8[/color] exclusively share the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] (they share no other [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color])"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]1[/color] and [color=#00FF00]5[/color] are [color=#0000FF]delicious[/color] but [color=#0000FF]poisonous[/color]"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]7[/color] and [color=#00FF00]10[/color] have all five [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color] between them"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]1[/color] and [color=#00FF00]4[/color] contain [color=#FF0000]Protein Powder[/color]"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]3[/color] and [color=#00FF00]7[/color] share two [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color], neither [color=#0000FF]taste[/color] very good"
"Shakes [color=#00FF00]4[/color] and [color=#00FF00]5[/color] share only one [color=#FF0000]ingredient[/color]"
"[rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] is not [color=#0000FF]poisonous[/color] and [color=#0000FF]tastes[/color] delicious"
"[rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] has either [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] or [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] but not both"
That's all ^_^

events.question: If you're having trouble, would you like me to show you the answer?

events.text:
Of course ^_^ Everyone needs help sometimes
Because [color=#00FF00]2[/color] and [color=#00FF00]9[/color] have exploded, they must both have the [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color] and [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] qualities, but not the [color=#0000FF]Absorbant[/color]
Because [color=#00FF00]2[/color] and [color=#00FF00]9[/color] can't be the same, one must have the [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color] quality, the other must have the [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color]
Because [color=#00FF00]9[/color] contains the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] and because the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] is neither [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] nor [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color], the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] must be either [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color] or [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color]. This also means that [color=#00FF00]2[/color] cannot contain the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color]
Because [color=#00FF00]6[/color] doesn't contain the [color=#0000FF]Absorbant[/color] but also hasn't exploded, [color=#00FF00]6[/color] cannot contain both the [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] and [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color] qualities
However, because [color=#00FF00]6[/color] shares two [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color] with [color=#00FF00]2[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]2[/color] has exploded, [color=#00FF00]6[/color] must contain either the [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] or [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color] (but not both)
Because [color=#00FF00]6[/color] doesn't contain the [color=#0000FF]Absorbant[/color], [color=#00FF00]6[/color]'s second shared [color=#FF0000]ingredient[/color] must be either the [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color] or [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color] ingredient
Because [color=#00FF00]6[/color]'s third (unshared) [color=#FF0000]ingredient[/color] cannot be the [color=#0000FF]Absorbant[/color], [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color], or [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color], it must be the second [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color]/[color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color]
Therefore, [color=#00FF00]6[/color] contains the [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color], [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color], and either [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] or [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color] qualities
Because the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] holds either the [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color] or [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color] quality, and because [color=#00FF00]6[/color] contains both, [color=#00FF00]6[/color] must contain the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color]
Because [color=#00FF00]6[/color] and [color=#00FF00]8[/color] exclusively share the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]6[/color] contains the [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] and [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color], [color=#00FF00]8[/color]'s other two [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color] must be the [color=#FF0000]Protein Powder[/color] and [color=#FF0000]Pistachios[/color]
Because both [color=#00FF00]6[/color] and [color=#00FF00]8[/color] are [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color], and because they exclusively share the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color], the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] must be [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color]
Because the [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color] quality belongs to either the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] or the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color], and because the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] is [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color], the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] must be [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color]
Because [color=#00FF00]9[/color] contains the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color], and because the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color] is [color=#0000FF]Poison[/color], [color=#00FF00]2[/color] must contain the [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color] quality (which is the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color])
Because [color=#00FF00]2[/color] and [color=#00FF00]6[/color] share two [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]2[/color] does not contain the [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color], [color=#00FF00]2[/color] must share the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] and [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] with [color=#00FF00]6[/color]
Because the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] is [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]2[/color] exploded, the [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] must be either [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] or [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color]
Because the [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] are either [color=#0000FF]Acidic[/color] or [color=#0000FF]Alkaline[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]9[/color] contains both, [color=#00FF00]9[/color] must contain the [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color]

events.question: Would you like me to keep going?

events.text:
Okay ^_^
Because [color=#00FF00]1[/color] and [color=#00FF00]5[/color] are [color=#0000FF]delicious[/color] but [color=#0000FF]poisonous[/color], they must both contain the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] and [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color]
Because shakes [color=#00FF00]1[/color], [color=#00FF00]5[/color], and [color=#00FF00]6[/color] all contain [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] and [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color], and because each shake is unique, and because [color=#00FF00]1[/color] and [color=#00FF00]6[/color] also each contain [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] and [color=#FF0000]Protein Powder[/color] respectively, [color=#00FF00]5[/color]'s final [color=#FF0000]ingredient[/color] must be [color=#FF0000]Pistachios[/color]
Because [color=#00FF00]4[/color] contains the [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color] and [color=#FF0000]Protein Powder[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]5[/color] contains the [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] and [color=#FF0000]E-Girl Bathwater[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]4[/color] and [color=#00FF00]5[/color] share only one [color=#FF0000]ingredient[/color], the shared [color=#FF0000]ingredient[/color] must be [color=#FF0000]Pistachios[/color]
Because [color=#00FF00]7[/color] is not [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color], and because [color=#00FF00]7[/color] and [color=#00FF00]10[/color] contain all five [color=#FF0000]ingredients[/color] between them, [color=#00FF00]10[/color] must have the [color=#0000FF]Tasty[/color] ingredient (which is [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color])

events.question: If you've been writing everything down, this should be enough to find the answer. But I can just give it to you too

events.text:
No problem ^_^
Because [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] is not [color=#0000FF]poisonous[/color], [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] cannot be shakes [color=#00FF00]1[/color], [color=#00FF00]5[/color], [color=#00FF00]6[/color], or [color=#00FF00]9[/color]
Because [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] is [color=#0000FF]delicious[/color], [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] cannot be shakes [color=#00FF00]3[/color], [color=#00FF00]4[/color], or [color=#00FF00]7[/color]
Because [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] doesn't have both [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color] and [color=#FF0000]Screams of the Unholy[/color], [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] cannot be shakes [color=#00FF00]2[/color] or [color=#00FF00]10[/color]
Because [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] cannot be shakes [color=#00FF00]1[/color], [color=#00FF00]2[/color], [color=#00FF00]3[/color], [color=#00FF00]4[/color], [color=#00FF00]5[/color], [color=#00FF00]6[/color], [color=#00FF00]7[/color], [color=#00FF00]9[/color], or [color=#00FF00]10[/color], [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] must be shake [color=#00FF00]8[/color]
[rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]The Perfect Protein Shake[/rainbow] is shake [color=#00FF00]8[/color] and contains the [color=#FF0000]Protein Powder[/color], [color=#FF0000]Blood of a Virgin[/color], and [color=#FF0000]Pistachios[/color]
That's the answer |('  o')|
Okay ^_^ don't hesitate to ask for help
Okay ^_^ don't hesitate to ask for help
Okay ^_^ don't hesitate to ask for help
